TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ActivityAction`1<T> extends System.Activities.ActivityDelegate
Public NotInheritable Class ActivityAction(Of T) Inherits ActivityDelegate
generic <typename T> public ref class ActivityAction sealed : System::Activities::ActivityDelegate

Docs.typeparam: The type of the in argument of the activity delegate.
Docs.summary: Defines an activity delegate that has one in argument and does not return a value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks An activity delegate allows a developer to define the required signature of an activity that will be specified by a third party.
There are multiple generic versions of this type that take from 1 to 16 arguments for the activity that is called. There are also **ActivityFunc** types for activity delegates that return values.
